Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

odds.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
odds.name: Dragon Lore

odds.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
odds.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

odds.description: An ancient and mysterious scrap of information about dragons from before the Doom of Valyria.
odds.name: Dragon Secrets

odds.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
odds.name: Livestock (Legendary)

odds.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
odds.name: Keystone

odds.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
odds.name: Brick

odds.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
odds.name: Soldier Pine

odds.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
odds.name: Valyrian Stone
